member_organisations: The Mediation Centre at the Croatian Chamber of Economy has no member organisations.
fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
eu_initiatives:
-    Directive 2013/11/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 May 2013 on Alternative Dispute Resolution for Consumer Disputes and Amending Regulation (EC) No 2006/2004, and Directive 2009/22/EC  
-    Regulation (EU) No 524/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 May 2013 on Online Dispute Resolution for Consumer Disputes and Regulation (EC) No2006/2004 and Directive 2009/22/EC
organisation_name: Mediation Centre at the Croatian Chamber of Economy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The Mediation Centre at the Croatian Chamber of Economy is not a member of any associations, (con)federations, networks or other.
relevant_communication:
-    organising Round Tables, Panel Discussions relating to ADR 
 
-    education of mediators 
 
-    publication of promotional materials and professional papers
goals__remit:
1.    to encourage mediation as the primary way of dispute resolution 
2.    organization of mediation proceedings 
3.    implementation and support of EU politics concerning alternative dispute resolution
